Key Match Events: India won by 9 wickets (with 18 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: India are looking to try out personnel for the 2024 T20 World Cup
Tilak Varma has emerged as a strong candidate for the No. 4 slot in the ODI World Cup squad
India can test him further in the Asia Cup to see where he stands
West Indies are rebuilding their T20I side and have a chance to win back-to-back T20I series for the first time since 2017
Shimron Hetmyer has looked off-colour and needs to turn it around on Friday
Shubman Gill has been dismissed in single digits in all three innings and needs to contribute bigger runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Teams batting first have won 11 of the 13 completed T20Is played in Lauderhill
There's a 47% chance of rain in the afternoon
Yuzvendra Chahal needs five wickets to become the first Indian, and eighth overall, to take 100 T20I wickets
Others: This is India's fifth T20I series under Hardik Pandya and they are yet to lose one
West Indies can also consider bringing in Shai Hope for one of Brandon King and Johnson Charles
